author: Kwatson43
title: Great For A Business Stay
text:
My company booked this hotel for a conference I needed to attend. The staff were friendly, giving me a room with a wonderful view of the city. It's close to the Eiffel Tower (about a 20 minute walk) and had all of the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. One thing I would note is that the room probably needed a bit of an update as there we’re features that looked shabby but it wasn’t the end of the world.
Room Tip: Just ask the reception for a room with a good view. See more room tips
